PointingGameEvaluator

class post_hoc.evaluation.PointingGameEvaluator

Bases: object

Calculates the Pointing Game score of an attribution as the fraction of the most attributed pixels that lie within the ground truth segmentation.

Methods Summary

__call__(hit_mask, vals[, masks])

param hit_mask:

[H,W] array of true segmentations of the image

Methods Documentation

__call__(hit_mask, vals, masks=None)
Parameters:

  • hit_mask (array) – [H,W] array of true segmentations of the image

  • vals (array) – Array of attribution scores for each image feature

  • masks (array) – [S,H,W] array of segment masks (None=vals per pixel)

Returns:

float – The Pointing Game score of the attribution
